data.name: Robotics in VR (demo) Demo
data.detailed_description:
Our team developed a gamified solution and curriculum for classroom and individual remote teaching the robotics in VR for students. We are tackling the problems of early professional orientation and equal access to education. Schools with underserved or underrepresented students could benefit from our scaled and cost-effective solution.
This version shows one lesson for a maximum of 8 students (basic version 24 students supported)
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Gamified solution, curriculum and content for teaching robotics in VR.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows™ 10
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i7 4th Generation equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:
